alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:48PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 530 PM MST... At 448 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Pleasant to Sun City to near South Mountain Park. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Tempe, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Wickenburg, Youngtown, Sun City West, Waddell, Laveen, Cashion, Circle City, Sun City, Wittmann and Litchfield Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 114 and 158. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 211. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Phoenix.
